introduction: This comprehensive marketing relationship plan is designed for beauty and cosmetics brands looking to build deep, loyal customer relationships through personalized skincare and beauty routines. Beauty consumers are highly engaged and seek expert guidance, personalized recommendations, and community connection. This plan leverages these behaviors to create meaningful touchpoints throughout the customer journey, from skin profile discovery to brand advocacy, while maximizing customer lifetime value through subscription models and routine building.

Dynamic content blocks in emails can show different product recommendations based on collected skin type data.

how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Quiz-to-automation workflows are ready in hours with pre-built beauty templates. Conditional logic routes customers to the right journey automatically, and A/B testing optimizes conversion at every step.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Real-time cart and browse abandonment triggers with sub-second response time ensure you reach customers when purchase intent is highest. Brevo's AI-powered send time optimization delivers recovery messages when each customer is most likely to engage.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for rich product showcases + SMS for urgent reminders + Push notifications for app users
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Set up once with smart defaults, then Brevo's machine learning continuously optimizes timing, messaging, and discount offers to maximize recovery rates while protecting margins.
